body: from what i understand, he likes the daughter but she was confessed to so he got depressed and was consoled by the mom

Page 11 is the meme face LMAO

Translate this please tho, it's a gem

Ah I see. His childhood friend already found a boyfriend and he is upset about it. He goes to his childhood friend's mother to express his frustration and she consoled him by letting him fuck her instead. Very motherly wholesome.
